main event: A UFO object was observed in the sky over Essex Junction, Vermont on October 19, 1955.
interesting points: The object was initially shaped like a half moon and then changed to a disk shape.
The object's size was about the size of a pea held at arm's length.
The object's color changed from a dull orange to blue-white as it diminished in size and disappeared.
The sighting was witnessed by a member of the 4602nd Air Intelligence Service Squadron.
The investigator concluded the object was likely a jet aircraft with an afterburner, flying away from the observer.
witnesses: a civilian and a military member
